response.original_title: Coraje y santidad: Sor Ana de los Ángeles
response.overview: Ana de los Ángeles, a 17th century woman with extraordinary gifts, faced her family's plans with great courage and holiness upon entering the Monastery of Santa Catalina de Arequipa. There he discovered true love for God and his neighbor. His story is a source of inspiration and strength, marked by wonderful graces, favors and prodigious miracles that, even today, continue to manifest through his intercession.
response.title: Coraje y santidad: Sor Ana de los Ángeles
